name: Become the Gatekeeper
text: Have 1 or more ships in 2 systems that contain different non-delta wormholes.

name: Make an Example of their World
text: Destroy the last of another player's ground forces on a planet during the Bombardment step.

name: Turn Their Fleets to Dust
text: Destroy the last of another player's non-fighter ships in a system during the Space Cannon Offense step.
